short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BunBox streamlines Gmail™ inboxes with AI, summarizing emails and suggesting responses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why Use BunBox AI? 

- BunBox’s artificial intelligence makes email efficient and fun. Emails can be overwhelming, stressful, and time-sucking. At BunBox, we’re fixing that by outfitting your email with the tools to catch up to the times. People want fast, efficient, and easy-to-use, and BunBox delivers. 

What Does It Do? 

- Instant Summaries: Uses GPT AI to generate clear, bullet-pointed overviews of entire email threads in mere seconds. BunBox denotes the dates, tone, and participants and catches you up on the conversation without having to dive into lengthy emails.

- Prompt Composition: BunBox makes you more productive by instantly writing appropriate replies to email threads using one of many preset prompt categories. You can also customize a prompt, and have our GPT AI assistant fill in the email for you!

Life-Changing Time Savings!

According to a McKinsey™ study, professionals spend 28% of their workday on emails, averaging 2.6 hours and 120 messages per day. 

Imagine if BunBox could increase your email efficiency by just 20%. At this rate, BunBox could help the average office worker save about 0.52 hours per day (31.2 minutes). Over a typical work year (260 days), this adds up to a substantial saving of approximately 135.2 hours, equals 3.38 standard 40-hour workweeks!

That’s time that could be better spent with family, advancing your career, or even exploring new hobbies.

BunBox is AI Email - The epitome of smart, rapid, and user-friendly email management. Step into the future of email management today - because why shouldn't email be fun?

-------

Compatibility: 

- BunBox is currently compatible with Gmail™
- Our extension can be downloaded from the Chrome Store
- Our Workplace Addon (which works on mobile too!), can be downloaded from the Google™ Workplace Addon Store.
